Title: Auth Bypass via DevTools - Voting
Description: Users can bypass authentication checks using browser DevTools (F12) and cast votes as any user.

Title: Auth Bypass via DevTools - User Deletion
Description: Users can bypass authentication checks using DevTools and delete arbitrary user accounts.

Title: Chromium Crash via About Page
Description: Under certain conditions, the About Us page may crash Chromium-based browsers.

Title: Server Crash via About Page
Description: In very rare cases, specific interaction sequences on the About Us page can crash the server.

Title: ESC Key Nonfunctional on Post Creation
Description: Pressing `Esc` does not close the post creation modal as expected.

Title: ASCII Art Display Issue
Description: ASCII art is improperly rendered due to missing newline characters.

Title: Feedback Rejection on Zero Rating
Description: Submitting feedback with a rating of 0 results in a 400 Bad Request error.

Title: Access Token Refresh Loop
Description: The frontend attempts to refresh access tokens repeatedly without backoff or error resolution, potentially spamming the backend and bloating logs.

Title: Auth Failure: Invalid Callback URL
Description: The frontend frequently triggers "InvalidCallbackUrl" errors, likely due to misconfigured or mismatched OAuth callback URIs, leading to over 5,000 repeated errors.

Title: Missing WebRootPath
Description: Static file serving is broken due to an invalid or missing WebRootPath, impacting delivery of frontend assets.

Title: JWT Token Expiration Exceptions
Description: Repeated `SecurityTokenExpiredException` errors suggest either poor refresh handling or excessive reliance on expired tokens.

Title: Comment Count Not Updating
Description: After submitting a comment, the comment count on the button does not update until manual refresh, leading to user confusion.

Title: Settings Page Soft-Locks Session
Description: Toggling background opacity causes the settings menu to soft-lock, requiring a full re-login to restore functionality.

Title: Settings Not Persisted Across Sessions
Description: User settings are not saved or reloaded after session restoration, resetting preferences like background opacity.
